front.title: A RADIUS Attribute, Binding and Profiles for SAML

abstract.t: This document specifies a RADIUS attribute, binding and two profiles for the Security Assertion Mark-up Language (SAML). The attribute provides RADIUS encapsulation of SAML protocol messages, while the binding describes the transport of this attribute, and the SAML protocol messages within, using RADIUS. The profiles describe the application of this binding for Abfab authentication and assertion query/request. The SAML RADIUS attribute and binding are defined generically to permit application in other scenarios, such as network access.
